Package logic.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.model.Model
  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for a match, which represents the current state of the game.
    Author:
    Luka Stoehr, Adrian Groeber

        Current round, starting with 0.

      • overlength

        public final int overlength
        Number of rounds after which Thanos appears

      • maxNrInftyStonesPlayerOne

        public int maxNrInftyStonesPlayerOne
        Maximum number of InfinityStones player one has owned during the match. Relevant to choose the winner if Thanos has atomized everybody.

      • maxNrInftyStonesPlayerTwo

        public int maxNrInftyStonesPlayerTwo
        Maximum number of InfinityStones player two has owned during the match. Relevant to choose the winner if Thanos has atomized everybody.

      • knockedOpHeroPlayerOne

        public int knockedOpHeroPlayerOne
        Number of heroes from the other team player one knocked out. Relevant to choose the winner if Thanos has atomized everybody.

      • knockedOpHeroPlayerTwo

        public int knockedOpHeroPlayerTwo
        Number of heroes from the other team player two knocked out. Relevant to choose the winner if Thanos has atomized everybody.

      • causedDamagePlayerOne

        public int causedDamagePlayerOne
        Amount of damage that was caused by player one. Relevant to choose the winner if Thanos has atomized everybody.

      • causedDamagePlayerTwo

        public int causedDamagePlayerTwo
        Amount of damage that was caused by player two. Relevant to choose the winner if Thanos has atomized everybody.

      • field

        public Placeable[][] field
        2D-array that represents the game field, containing all Rocks, Heroes...

        Reference to Thanos. Null, if Thanos has not shown up yet.

        Refernce to the Controller which controls this match and therefore this model.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model​(int fieldSizeX,
             int fieldSizeY,
             int overlength,
             Player playerOne,
             Player playerTwo,
             Controller controller)
        Constructor for the Model class
        Parameters:
        fieldSizeX - Length of field on x axis.
        fieldSizeY - Length of field on y axis.
        overlength - Number of round in which Thanos appears.
        playerOne - Player object for player 1
        playerTwo - Player object for player 2
        controller - The controller that runs this match

    • Method Detail

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree​(Position position)
        Checks if the field at a certain Position is free. If position is not on the field, this method returns false.
        Parameters:
        position - Position to check.
        Returns:
        True if field is free.

      • onField

        public boolean onField​(Position position)
        Checks if a Position is inside of the range of the field array.
        Parameters:
        position - Position to check
        Returns:
        Whether position is on the field

      • seeThroughField

        public boolean seeThroughField​(Position position)
        Checks if a certain field allows a line of sight or blocks it.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the field to check.
        Returns:
        Whether the field is "see-through"

      • checkLineOfSight

        public boolean checkLineOfSight​(Position a,
                                Position b)
        This method checks if a line of sight exists between two fields. For that it checks every field that is in the line of sight and returns false if a Placeable on one of the fields blocks the line of sight. The algorithm is inspired by: https://www.redblobgames.com/grids/line-drawing.html
        Parameters:
        a - Start Position
        b - End Position
        Returns:
        Whether the line of sight is unobstructed between field a and b.

      • setPlayerTeam

        public boolean setPlayerTeam​(Profile profile,
                             ConfigHero[] playerTeam)
        This method is used to set the hero selection of a player. It converts the ConfigHero[] playerTeam to a Hero[] and sets the PID and IDs of the Heroes accordingly.
        Parameters:
        profile - the profile of the player for which the selection has been confirmed
        playerTeam - the Hero set of the player which has been accepted
        Returns:
        returns true if the team was successfully set to one of the players

      • checkMaxNrInftyStones

        public void checkMaxNrInftyStones()
        Method that counts how many InfinityStones each player currently has. The max number of InfinityStones must be checked regularly, as this is important to decide who wins if Thanos destroys everybody.

      • singleConfigCharacterToHero

        public Hero singleConfigCharacterToHero​(ConfigHero cc,
                                        int PID,
                                        int ID)
        This method converts a SingleConfigCharacter to a Hero object. This method is part of the Model class, because each Hero object needs a model when it is created.
        Parameters:
        cc - SingleConfigCharacter to convert
        PID - PlayerID (either 1 or 2) for this Hero
        ID - ID of this hero (from 0 to 5)
        Returns:
        New Hero object

      • getWinner

        public Player getWinner()
        Checks if the game has ended and if so, returns the winner.
        Returns:
        Winner of this match, or null if it is still running
